# Jocelyn Pang

> Digital commerce strategist-operator building durable e-commerce growth pillars for FMCG brands across Southeast Asia. Based in Singapore.

Jocelyn Pang is a digital commerce strategist with extensive experience scaling FMCG (Fast-Moving Consumer Goods) brands across Southeast Asian markets including Singapore, Malaysia, Philippines, Vietnam, Indonesia, and Thailand.

She specializes in:
- E-commerce strategy and marketplace optimization
- Building digital commerce channels from zero to growth pillars
- Fixing underperforming e-commerce fundamentals
- Social commerce, affiliate marketing, and content selling
- Cross-market digital transformation for FMCG brands

## Services

- [Strategic Consultancy](https://jocelynpang.com/#contact): E-commerce strategy, marketplace optimization, and growth frameworks for FMCG brands scaling across Southeast Asia
- [Keynotes & Panels](https://jocelynpang.com/#speaking): Insights on digital commerce challenges and what actually works at scale
- [Workshops & Team Sessions](https://jocelynpang.com/#speaking): Hands-on sessions for leadership teams navigating digital transformation

## Key Pages

- [Homepage](https://jocelynpang.com/): Overview of services and expertise
- [About](https://jocelynpang.com/#about): Background and experience
- [Selected Work](https://jocelynpang.com/#work): Case studies from FMCG brands in Southeast Asia
- [Speaking](https://jocelynpang.com/#speaking): Topics and booking information
- [Contact](https://jocelynpang.com/#contact): Enquiry form and email

## Case Studies

- [Plant-based FMCG Brand](https://jocelynpang.com/#work): Zero to growth pillar in 6 months across Malaysia, Philippines, and Vietnam
- [Health & Wellness Brand](https://jocelynpang.com/#work): From underperformance to category leader with +60% category over-indexing
- [Infant Nutrition Brand](https://jocelynpang.com/#work): +45% category over-indexing in a declining market

## Speaking Topics

- Why most FMCG e-commerce strategies break at scale
- The hidden cost of performance-led growth
- Operating digital commerce across uneven SEA markets
